long_description: The women's Gregory Sage 55 pack is ideal for trekking, overnight trips and general mountain use. It offers the perfect blend of volume, comfort and organizational features. Breathable, molded foam back panel, shoulder straps and hipbelt offer stable comfort for the long haul and are shaped specifically for female anatomy. Intuition 3D suspension with a sturdy wishbone wire-hoop frame offers effective load transfer to your hips. Generous main compartment can be accessed via the top lid and through a horseshoe-shaped zipper in the front panel. Externally accessible hydration compartment holds a reservoir of your choice (reservoir sold separately). Top lid sports a roll-top style pocket that offers great water resistance and an internal security pocket. Zippered side stash pocket offers quick access to small items. Side and bottom compression straps minimize bulk and help stabilize your load. Dual attachment points let you strap ice axes or other tools to the outside of the pack body. The Gregory Sage 55 pack features an integrated, color-matched raincover.
short_description: The women's Gregory Sage 55 pack is ideal for trekking, overnight trips and general mountain use. It offers the perfect blend of volume, comfort and organizational features.
